1111100010010111 1001001110110111 1 -> sum: 1000110001001111, cout: 1
0111011111000011 1011110100011010 1 -> sum: 0011010011011110, cout: 1
0011101111001101 0011011001100000 1 -> sum: 0111001000101110, cout: 0
1010111111001110 1101110111000010 0 -> sum: 1000110110010000, cout: 1
0110111000101001 0000101001001110 0 -> sum: 0111100001110111, cout: 0
0100100011000011 1101010010101111 1 -> sum: 0001110101110011, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
